home.subtitle: Our all-in-one suite of services is designed to give your project the edge over your competitors, achieve market growth and help your project drive exceptional results.
home.our.services: We’re on a mission to make an impact on the global adoption of blockchain through our suite of tailored services, and incredible talent and by fuelling exciting Web3 projects.

about.title:

 team of experts
about.our.mission: We’re on a mission to make an impact on the global adoption of blockchain through our suite of tailored services, incredible talent and by fuelling exciting Web3 projects.
about.text: We’re a full service, Web3 marketing agency with a global footprint across Europe, Asia, Australia, America, and Africa. As a subsidiary of Faculty Group, we’re proud to play a part in a group of companies creating a monumental impact in the world of Web3. Our team is the fuel that powers the X8C engine, a collective of thought leaders, creatives and process driven marketeers.

about.meet.team.text: Our vision is to make an impact on the global adoption of blockchain through our tailored services, incredible talent and by fuelling exciting Web3 projects.
sprint.brand.text:
Over a 15 day period, we'll work together to identify the core of your brand, define your target audience, and create a clear and compelling brand messaging and visual identity. This intensive, focused process will help you create a strong foundation for your brand and gear you for growth.

 • Strategy Position & Messaging
 • Complete Brand Identity
 • Brand Guidelines
 • Website Design
 • Presentation/Deck Templates
sprint.product.text:
Over a 20 day period, we'll work together to identify the core value proposition of your product, define your target audience, and create a clear and compelling product vision. We'll also prototype and test key features to ensure that your product is user-friendly and delivers the value your customers are looking for. By the end of the sprint, you'll have a solid foundation for your web product and a clear plan for bringing it to life.

 • Define the vision
 • User personas
 • Core value proposition
 • Create the product vision
 • Prototype & test
 • Refine
 • Launch plan
sprint.how.it.works.text: Our marketing sprints allow you to make rapid progress on specific projects or initiatives. Because marketing sprints are focused and time-limited, you can make significant progress on specific goals in a short period of time. They help you prioritise your marketing efforts. By focusing on a limited number of goals, you can ensure that you are working on the most important projects and not spreading yourself too thin.
